properties.entry: SELECT REPLY_KEY, REPLY_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(REPLY_CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')AS REPLY_CREATE_DATE, BOARD_NO, MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NICK, PROFILE_IMG FROM REPLY JOIN MEMBER USING (MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND REPLY_ST = 'N' ORDER BY REPLY_KEY
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPLY WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND REPLY_ST = 'N'
UPDATE REPLY SET REPLY_ST = 'Y' WHERE REPLY_NO = ?
UPDATE REPLY SET REPLY_CONTENT = ? WHERE REPLY_NO = ?
